messages.subject: ap/hs e-lists
messages.msgSnippet: found this listing of e-lists on the mothering boards, for anyone s who s interested... **http://groups.yahoo.com/group/AP-HS-W-luv/ AP-HS-W-luv · Has
messages.messageBody:
found this listing of e-lists on the mothering boards, for anyone's
who's interested...

**http://groups.yahoo.com/group/AP-HS-W-luv/
AP-HS-W-luv · Has Attachment Parenting (homebirth, breastfeeding,
the family bed, holistic nutrition and healing, baby wearing) naturally
led...

**http://groups.yahoo.com/group/APAlternative/
If you practice attachment parenting then this is the group for you.
This is a
group where AP moms can make friends, share advice, and offer support.
If you
homeschool, unschool, wear your baby, care about a healthy lifestyle,
are unsure
about the safety of vaccines, co-sleep, and parent through instinct,
then we'd
love to have you in the group!

**http://groups.yahoo.com/group/veggiemums/
This list is for mothers who are Vegan or Vegetarian, although our focus
will be on
Veganism. This is the place to talk about nutrition for children and
families, ethical
treatment of animals and other aspects of being Veggie. Discussion may
include
AP parenting, homeschool and natural lifestyle. This is not the place to
debate
over religion so please just don't bring it here. Let's just talk about
our children
and being Mums!!!!

**http://groups.yahoo.com/group/SlightlyCrunchyAP/
Are you only "slightly crunchy?" This is an attachment parenting list
for those of
us who are not quite totally "granola."

**http://groups.yahoo.com/group/RRmom/
Readers of Mothering magazine and like-minded parents who practice and
support
natural parenting through breastfeeding, informed and optional
vaccinations,
family bed, birth choices, schooling options and advocate the safety and

well-being ofall children through the old style of mothering.

**http://groups.yahoo.com/group/alter...mamascohousing/
Single mamas can unite to find a housemate with similar hobbies,
parenting
philosphies and goals. This list is for alternative mamas who practice
attachment
parenting, gentle discipline, breastfeeding, co-sleeping, homeschooling
and other
lifestyles such as being vegetarians/vegan, natural medicines, TV-free
home etc
etc. Post you wants and needs and find a housemate to share
responsibilities and
have built-in friends for yourself and your child(ren)

--
Jessica Kelly
W o r d U p

that our children and adults can go to and learn about the
